<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting">

        <number>SNSCRIPT0001115</number>
        <replaced_by/>
        <script>function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading, isTemplate) {
   if (newValue == '') {
	   return;
   }

	var authenticated = g_form.getValue('u_caller_authenticated');
	
	if (authenticated == 'true') {
		
	    g_form.hideFieldMsg('u_caller');	
	}
}
</script>
        <script_2/>
        <script_type/>
        <short_description>To remove the message from the script above</short_description>
